Package it.polimi.ingsw.networking.rmi

Interface RMIAsyncHelper

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Loggable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientRMI, ServerRMIConnectionHandler
    public interface RMIAsyncHelper
extends Loggable
    Helper interface for RMI class handlers used to send asynchronous tasks in client/server communications.
    Author:
    Stefano Formicola
